amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $200 million and increase funding for Capital Investment Grants by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $200 million and restore the amount to the Capital Investment Grants account for use in mass transit rail systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A014) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A014) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Dold.
